body: $AAPL Tim Apple
$AAPL apple board full of weirdos. Polite conversations with me on one post and blocking me on the next 😂

$SPY also had to listen to CNBC on the radio and boy are they all fear mongering idiots. 
 
To say that there is no growth in $AAPL and somehow people should time in and out of trades is PURE AGENDA. CNBC sells you the idea that you should trade and ultimately fail. 
 
Notice how they never EVER talk about what his happening in the bond market and how the bond market is losing HUGE $$???? The bond market is much bigger than the stock market. The bond market is the key to how $$ actually flow around in assets classes.

$dwac You know Biden-Harris is a disaster of epic proportions when it only takes a year for Democrats to call for Hillary 2024.

$Spy $Ba $AAPL $PYPL

links.title: Day Trading in Wall Street's Complex 'Fear Gauge' Proliferates (Published 2017)
links.description: Each morning, at the market's open, Seth M. Golden, a former logistics manager at a Target store, fires up the computer in his home office in northern Florida and does what he has done for years: Put on bets that Wall Street's index of volatility, the VIX, will keep falling.
